unlimitedRewind.title: Unlimited rewind

premiumPaywall.terms: You can cancel anytime through the App Store / Google Play.

onboarding.title:
Meet real people,
in real places
onboarding.subtitle: Discover and connect with people who frequent the same places as you. Make friends, chat and expand your social network
onboarding.termsPrefix: By continuing, you agree to our
onboarding.phoneAuthTitle: Sign in with your phone number
onboarding.phoneAuthSubtitle: We'll send you a verification code via SMS
onboarding.phoneInfo: By continuing, you will receive an SMS with the verification code. Message and data rates may apply.
onboarding.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
onboarding.codeNotReceived: Didn't receive the code? Check if the number is correct or try again in a few moments.
onboarding.nameSubtitle: This name will appear on your profile
onboarding.ageSubtitle: We need your date of birth to personalize your experience and confirm that you are over 18 years old.
onboarding.ageRequired: Please select your date of birth
onboarding.ageMinimum: You must be 18 years or older to use this app.
onboarding.genderSubtitle: Choose the gender that best suits you. This helps create more genuine and respectful connections.
onboarding.genderUpdateInfo: You can update this information anytime in settings.
onboarding.genderCustomPrompt: Want to tell us more about you? We're listening ðŸ’¬
onboarding.genderCustomPlaceholder: Tell us more about your gender
onboarding.genderNotFound: Didn't find your identity? Tap here to let us know.
onboarding.genderSuggestDescription: Help us be more inclusive! Share your suggestion and we'll consider including it.
onboarding.genderSuggestionSuccess: Thank you for the suggestion! We'll review and consider including it soon.
onboarding.connectWithTitle: Who would you like to connect with?
onboarding.connectWithInfo: This information will not be displayed publicly.
onboarding.connectWithPrivacy: This information is only used to show people you want to connect with.
onboarding.connectWithFooter: You can change this later in settings.
onboarding.intentionTitle: What do you want to find here?
onboarding.intentionSubtitle: We use this to show people with the same goals as you
onboarding.photosSubtitle: Select 3 to 9 photos at once. Profiles with more photos get more connections!
onboarding.locationSubtitle: To find people and places near you, we need your location. You can turn this off anytime
onboarding.locationPrivacy: Your location data is private and secure
onboarding.locationDeniedMessage: You denied location permission. You can enable it later in the app settings.
onboarding.locationError: Error requesting location permission. Please try again.
onboarding.notificationsSubtitle: We use notifications to notify you about important news in the app.
onboarding.notificationsDeniedMessage: You denied notification permission. You can enable it later in the app settings.
onboarding.notificationsError: Error requesting notification permission. Please try again.
onboarding.completeTitle: You're all set to start connecting!
onboarding.completeSubtitle: Enter a place and see who also shares the same interests.

categoryResults.subtitle: See the most popular places in the area
categoryResults.emptyTitle: No places of this category around here
categoryResults.emptyDescription: There are no places of this category around here yet. How about exploring another vibe? ðŸ‘€
categoryResults.searchFallback: Didn't find what you're looking for?

placeSearch.emptyDescription: Type the name of a place or pick a suggestion.
placeSearch.noResultsDescription: Try searching with another name or check the spelling.

home.heroTitle: Where do you want to connect today?
home.heroSubtitle: Pick the vibe and discover who's already there.
home.infoDescription: Choose a category and see nearby spots where you can connect with others.

highlighted.title: Trending now
highlighted.description: Busy spots full of people connecting.

nightlife.title: Bars & nightlife
nightlife.description: Go out and meet new people.

cafes.title: CafÃ©s & hangouts
cafes.description: Cozy spots to chat and relax.

chat.title: Chat
chat.emptySubtitle: Start connecting with people nearby to begin chatting.

active.subtitle: People are connected here right now!
active.microcopy: You'll be able to see and chat with people at this place right now.

quiet.subtitle: It's a bit empty here right now...
quiet.supportText: No one's connected yet, but you can be the first!
quiet.microcopy: When other people arrive, you'll see them appear here.

premium.subtitle: You're getting ahead of the game. âš¡
premium.supportText: Premium members can connect before arriving at the place.
premium.microcopy: When you get close, the app will notify you automatically.

locked.subtitle: This place is out of your reach right now.
locked.supportText: Only Premium members can connect in advance to distant locations.
locked.microcopy: Unlock early connections and see who's at places before you arrive.

alreadyConnected.subtitle: You're already connected at {{currentVenue}}!
alreadyConnected.supportText: Want to leave there and enter here?
alreadyConnected.microcopy: You can only be connected at one place at a time â€” to keep everything real and authentic.

leaveConfirmation.title: Disconnect from location?
leaveConfirmation.description: When you leave, you'll stop appearing to people at this place.

profileSwiper.emptyStateDescription: Come back later to see new people!

placePeople.premiumDescription: Premium subscribers can see and connect with people anywhere, even without being physically present!

gender.title: Gender
